channel.description: Recent content in Judiciary Drama on The Guyana Brief

item.title: üîç [CRITICAL] Wednesday Brief: Guyanese Takes IICA Helm, Census Controversy, and Cybercrime Crackdown
item.description: Muhammad Ibrahim becomes IICA Director-General, census data sparks housing debate, cybercrime law faces criticism, and AG slams courts for ignoring legislation.

item.title: Tuesday's Guyana Brief: Apps, Laws, and Courtroom Drama
item.description: Attorney General scolds magistrates for ignoring laws, government promises 87 new apps, and President Ali discovers swamps can become highways (who knew?). Welcome to Tuesday in paradise!
